titleStmt.title: Communion vvith God. in two sermons preach'd at Paul's: the first, Sept. 3, 1654, the second, March 25, 1655. / By Samuel Annesley L.L.D. minister of the gospel at John Evangel London.
titleStmt.author: Annesley, Samuel, 1620?-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Evan Tyler, and are to be sold by Nathanael Web and William Grantham, at the signe of the Black Bear in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Imprimatur, dated Thursday the 27 of March 1655, precedes title page and is also printed on last leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Black Bear in Pauls Church-yard
